issue.title: [Release] Remove source artifacts from dev dist system after release vote passes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4020](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4020). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have accumulated a lot of artifacts in https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/dev/arrow. This is not scalable. I'm going to remove the old RC's for now, but this should be part of post-release scripts or release manager duties

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4020?focusedCommentId=16873778) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4710
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4710>
